Package ch.bfh.ti.gravis.core.step

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IStep
    A step in the graph algorithm visualisation.
    IStepRecorder
    A step recorder simplifies visualisation change operations at a graph item.
    IStepResult
    A step result contains the comment of a step DO or UNDO operation.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ComplexStep
    A complex step contains an arbitrary number of nested steps (composite design pattern).
    DashedCommand
    Performs a DO or UNDO operation at the graph item method IGraphItem.setCurrentDashed(boolean).
    EmptyStep
    This implementation of IStep performs no operation.
    ResultCommand
    Performs a DO or UNDO operation at the graph item method IGraphItem.setCurrentResult(double).
    StateCommand
    Performs a DO or UNDO operation at the graph item method IGraphItem.setCurrentState(ItemState).
    StepBuilder
    A step builder collects sequences of graph items and transforms this sequences into visualisation steps.
    StepRecorder
    An implementation of IStepRecorder interface.
    StepResult
    An implementation of IStepResult.
    StepTransformer
    A step transformer transforms a single graph item into a step.
    TaggedCommand
    Performs a DO or UNDO operation at the graph item method IGraphItem.setCurrentTagged(boolean).
    VisibleCommand
    Performs a DO or UNDO operation at the graph item method IGraphItem.setCurrentVisible(boolean).
